channel.title: CVE Feed for technocrackers -- Christmas Greetings
channel.description: The latest CVEs for technocrackers -- Christmas Greetings

item.title: CVE-2024-2116|2024-03-29T06:43:58.614Z -- technocrackers -- christmas%20greetings
item.description: The Christmas Greetings plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the code parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
